DataElement.preferredName: Stage Prognostic Factor Diagnosis Bone Metastasis Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Field identifies whether brain is an involved metastatic site.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Stage Prognostic Factor Diagnosis Bone Metastasis Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body._The general personal and health characteristics that have a bearing on the course of a disease and its eventual outcome._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body._The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.:The general personal and health characteristics that have a bearing on the course of a disease and its eventual outcome.

Concepts.definition: The extent of a cancer in the body.
The general personal and health characteristics that have a bearing on the course of a disease and its eventual outcome.

Property.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.:The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.

The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.

DataElementConcept.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.: A position in relation to its surroundings.: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site.
A position in relation to its surroundings.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.
